mapper.select: select id, year, department, type, level, factor from level_factor WHERE department = #{departmentId} and year = #{year}
select id, type, level, factor from level_factor where id = #{id}
select id, type, level, factor from level_factor where type = #{type} and level = #{level} and department = #{department} and year = #{year} limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO level_factor (id, department, type, level, factor) values (#{id}, #{department}, #{type}, #{level}, #{factor}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE department=values(department), type=values(type), level=values(level),factor=values(factor)
